title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Park Home
body: An Ancient River in a Modern City  Today the river valley attracts us for so many reasons. Take a solitary walk to enjoy natureâ€™s display, raft leisurely through the rocky shoals with friends, fish the misty waters as the sun comes up, or have a picnic on a Sunday afternoon. Get Outdoors and experience your Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area as you have never done before.              Nature Of The Chattahoochee River   The Gulf Fritillary butterfly is just one of the many creatures that live in the park. Come out to learn more about the wildlife!
